colour_scheme.title: Colour Scheme
colour_scheme.description: Choose how Nommie looks across all devices. The colour scheme setting applies everywhere you're signed in.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Choose a visual theme for the game table and interface. Each theme has its own unique colour palette and style.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose the language Nommie uses for menus, buttons, and game prompts.

cardConfirmation.title: Card confirmation
cardConfirmation.description: Keep the confirmation button if you prefer a two-step action, or turn it off to play a legal card immediately when you click it.

trickDisplayDuration.title: Trick display duration
trickDisplayDuration.description: How long the completed trick is shown before the next trick starts. Set to 0 to disable.

system.label: Use system default
system.description: Automatically align with your device setting.

dark.label: Dark
dark.description: Dim background that is easier on eyes at night.

standard.label: Standard
standard.description: Classic green felt casino table with sophisticated styling

high_roller.label: High Roller
high_roller.description: Bold Vegas-style with rich reds, golds, and blacks

oldtime.label: Oldtime
oldtime.description: Art deco inspired theme with dramatic flair

enabled.title: Confirmation required
enabled.description: Play button is shown. Pick a card, then confirm.

disabled.title: Auto-play cards
disabled.description: Skips the confirmation button. Clicking a legal card plays it immediately.

trickDisplayDuration.label: Duration (seconds)
trickDisplayDuration.description: Time to display the completed trick before starting the next one
trickDisplayDuration.help: Leave empty to use the default ({defaultValue} seconds). Set to 0 to disable the display.
